body:
I wish they had a tournament of nebula;) would be great to play with teams from the same server.

 
xDDDD and the prize is a range :)

title: When will there be a tournament NEBULA? o.O

replies.body: There has been some speculation about a tournament coming up soon, though it is not confirmed. You are able to join clans though.
replies.body_tagged: There has been some speculation about a tournament coming up soon, though it is not confirmed. You are able to join clans though.

replies.body: They announced it would come with the avicore update and the prize would be 25 bucks to spend on avicus shop but there is no tourney.
replies.body_tagged: They announced it would come with the avicore update and the prize would be 25 bucks to spend on avicus shop but there is no tourney.

replies.body:
I've made a clan if you want to join. Post an application on the discussion!
http://avicus.net/forums/79b9302ac
